sub_title: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking
summary:
Highly motivated, dedicated and creative young specialist with experience in Business Development and Marketing in both The Netherlands and Russia. Not only working full-time but also consulting startups and young entrepreneurs worldwide. I help them to deal with the fundamentals of a business before going to a market and/or growing. These activities help not only with my professional development but also allow young entrepreneurs to bring ideas to life.
Adept at Growth Hacking techniques with experience in leading teams. A detail-oriented person who is capable of assuring the highest possible quality as a leader and as a team player. I am not afraid of changes and difficulties, but I try to use them to achieve my goals.


But the most important: I enjoy what I do because I believe if you "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." (it's Confucius by the way)

certifications.name: SaaS Sales Method Certification - Mastership in Sales
Bachelor of Applied Science: International Business Management

projects.title: Belgian market development
projects.description: Belgian market was always substantial for TS24, primarily because of its location and language. Talking about the Belgian market, I mean its Flemish part (Dutch-speaking). For the past several years we saw the significant demand from Belgian customers for TS24's products. So now it's a right time to start exploring this area further, which is my task to do. I wouldn't really call it the task because it's a very interesting project, which doesn't make me feel under a pressure. The whole issue is divided into three big parts: market research, customers' behaviour analysis and the plan of the new strategy implementation (4p and other). The project has just begun, so it means that more updates to come.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Customer loyalty programme improvement through online marketing

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Returns system optimisation
projects.description: TS24 sells hundreds of products every day to dozens of customers from different countries. It is obvious that some of these products might be returned by customers with the different reasons. In order to create an effective, fast and simple system, I had to completely change the current approach. I cannot say that it was an easy task but at the end of the day, I've deeply studied the internal processes of the company, improved my knowledge in logistics and learnt about optimisation of warehouse processes. By the end of the project, employees no longer had to spend a lot of time, solving logistical issues. We also received the feedback from our happy customers, they were glad that their problems have been solved fastly and with the expected care level.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Improvement of Customer support service
projects.description: The company faced an issue of overwhelmed Customer support employees. The demand for the products started growing and more customers wanted to get in touch with the company. In this situation, the quick and effective solution was needed. It was proposed by me to use a more efficient and easy-to-use platform, in order to decrease the pressure on employees. Starting from March 2018, we have been using the new approach and it shows great results. The efficiency of Customer support service doubled compared to the previous year, the time of resolving customers' issues decreased by 50%.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Marketing plan for Utrecht Business School to enter the Flemish market with franchising
projects.description:
Writing the marketing plan for Utrecht Business School to enter the Flemish market with franchising. This marketing plan is the subject of the final assignment. 
The period of writing the thesis: February 2017 - July 2017
The objective of the final assignment is to provide an advisory report for UBS, , on how to enter the Flemish market by the means of franchising. Besides that, an advice is given on how to set up a franchise in the Flemish market in the most efficient way and at the lowest possible costs.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Utkonos market development plan
projects.description: The objective of this project was to create a market development plan for Utkonos to enter the Dutch market. This report contains an analysis of the internal, external and the competitive analysis of the Dutch market and, in this way Utkonos had an idea on how to enter the Dutch market. Further scope was taken by focusing on cross border e-commerce.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking
ERP engineer Oracle | MSc. Business Administration

projects.title: The impact of color in newspaper and magazine advertising
projects.description: This paper explores how the psychology of color influences purchasing behavior as it pertains to magazine, newspaper advertising and the consumer. While no single set of rules governs color choices, the research has established general guidelines based on the principle of associative learning, the relationship between color and emotion.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Market research of bicycle market in Russia
projects.description: European manufacturer of folding bicycles assesses the feasibility of entering the Russian market. On the instructions of the company were conducted a market research to identify the major players, their strengths and weaknesses, as well as their characteristics, assessment.

contributors.headline: A young professional making businesses to grow better💡🚀 | Strategy | Marketing | Growth Hacking

projects.title: Market research of confectionery market in the Russian Federation
projects.description: The object the project is to increase the share of Nestle in the confectionery market in Russia. As a product was chosen chocolate bar KitKat. The ratio of imported and domestic brands in the Russian market was analyzed, as well as the main consumer preferences.

projects.title: Management as an art
projects.description:
In this project was considered administrative activity as art of management on different sides.
Tasks of the project: consideration of management mechanisms and allocation of the main methods of management. Examples of using Arts Management in real situations were also described.

profile_positions.description: Project leader & manager for Autokopen.nl. Autokopen.nl has been recently acquired by Dealerdirect Media (ikwilvanmijnautoaf is part of Dealerdirect). My goal is to bring this project to the modern level and create a successful international business.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader
Market Development Representative

profile_positions.description:
As a part of the management team, Business Development was my field of responsibility. It includes:
- defining the company's overall marketing strategy and assisting in its implementation
- defining the overall sales strategy and assisting in its implementation
- participating in the decision-making process on the company level
- organising and giving the training to the employees
- hiring and managing the Growth team
profile_positions.title: VP of Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Acting as an ambassador for the organization
- Periodically consulting with board members on their roles and helping them assess
their performance
- Reviewing outcomes and metrics created by Hive01 for evaluating its impact, and
regularly measuring its performance and effectiveness using those metrics
- Developing and managing relationships and communicating with founders,
partners, and other stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Chairwoman

profile_positions.description:

- Flemish market development

time and in line with cost targets
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
During the 6-month programme in the non-profit organisation NESST (now Hive01), I was creating and developing my own startup idea. At the end of the programme, I've been selected to give the final pitch of my idea at the "Dragon's Den" event. 
During the process, I've learned how to ideate the concept, create a structured business plan which covers all aspects of future business and present it to the public. Besides that, I've developed many (business) connections in the region.
profile_positions.title: Startup Accelerator participant

company.name: University of Twente & Saxion University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
Connect programme was organised by University Twente and Saxion University of Applied Sciences for the talented graduates and young professionals. 
Within the 6-month programme, together with other participants, I had weekly workshops where I developed my communication skills, business etiquette, self-branding and many other highly useful skills. By the end of the programme, I've been matched with one of my future employers. TS24 was the company that hired me after my graduation from Connect.
